name: Introduction to Journalism
description: An introduction to the world of journalism. Learn the history and basics of journalism and how journalism is changing in the digital age.

name: Writing for Journalists
description: Learn the basics of writing for journalists. Learn the basics of writing for broadcast and print media, as well as the basics of grammar and style.

name: News Reporting and Editing
description: Learn the fundamentals of news reporting and editing. Learn how to find and research stories, and understand the basic principles of editing a news story.

name: Ethics in Journalism
description: This course focuses on the ethical considerations of journalism, such as objectivity, accuracy, integrity, and fairness.

name: Business Journalism
description: Learn the basics of business journalism. Learn how to research and report on business news, as well as the basics of financial analysis and financial reporting.
